BertNado Modules¶

bertnado.data.prepare_dataset.prepare_data(file_path, target_column, fasta_file, tokenizer_name, output_dir)[source]¶

Load and split the dataset into training, validation, and test sets based on chromosome, fetch sequences, and convert to Hugging Face Dataset.

bertnado.data.prepare_dataset.tokenize_dataset(dataset, tokenizer_name)[source]¶

Tokenize the sequences in the dataset using a specified tokenizer.

bertnado.training.sweep.run_sweep(config_path, output_dir, model_name, dataset, sweep_count, project_name, task_type)[source]¶

Run hyperparameter sweep using wandb.

bertnado.training.full_train.full_train(output_dir, model_name, dataset, best_config_path, task_type, project_name, pos_weight=None)[source]¶

Perform a full fine-tune using the best configuration from the sweep.

bertnado.evaluation.predict.predict_and_evaluate(model_path, test_path, output_dir, task_type)[source]¶

Predict and evaluate results for different task types.

bertnado.evaluation.feature_extraction.extract_shap_features(model_path, test_path, output_dir)[source]¶

Run SHAP analysis and save results.
